faqs.question: What services does Inchtomilez offer?
faqs.answer: Inchtomilez offers 12 core services including Digital Marketing (SEO, PPC, Social Media), Advertising, Branding, Website & App Development, Software Development, Graphic Design, Media Production, Public Relations, Political Campaigns, OOH Advertising, Radio & Newspaper Advertising, and Product Marketing.

faqs.question: Where is Inchtomilez located?
faqs.answer: Inchtomilez is located in Vijay Nagar, Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452010, India. We serve clients across Indore, MP, and throughout India.

faqs.question: Which industries does Inchtomilez specialize in?
faqs.answer: We serve 18+ industries including Healthcare, Education, Real Estate, E-Commerce, Technology, Finance, Hospitality, Automotive, Fashion, Legal, Manufacturing, Agriculture, Logistics, Construction, Retail, Energy, Non-Profit, and Sports & Fitness.

faqs.question: What is Inchtomilez's experience in digital marketing?
faqs.answer: Founded in 2014, Inchtomilez has 10+ years of experience with 1,850+ projects delivered, 524 active clients, and a 99.2% client satisfaction rate.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez offer SEO services in Indore?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are a leading SEO company in Indore offering comprehensive SEO services including local SEO, technical SEO, on-page optimization, link building, and content strategy.

faqs.question: What makes Inchtomilez different from other agencies?
faqs.answer: We combine 10+ years of local market expertise with data-driven strategies, offer industry-specific solutions, maintain a 99.2% satisfaction rate, and provide full-service integrated marketing with measurable ROI.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez build websites and mobile apps?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete website and mobile app development services including responsive design, e-commerce platforms, custom web applications, and iOS/Android app development.

faqs.question: Can Inchtomilez help with Google Ads and PPC campaigns?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in PPC management including Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and other paid advertising platforms with focus on ROI optimization.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez offer branding services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide complete branding services including brand strategy, logo design, visual identity development, brand guidelines, packaging design, and rebranding.

faqs.question: What is Inchtomilez's pricing model?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies based on services and project scope. We offer custom packages tailored to your budget and goals. Contact us for a free consultation and personalized quote.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez work with small businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with businesses of all sizes from startups and small local businesses to large enterprises, providing scalable solutions for every budget.

faqs.question: How can I contact Inchtomilez?
faqs.answer: You can reach us at hello@inchtomilez.com, call +91-731-4982000, or visit our website at https://inchtomilez.com/contact to schedule a consultation.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez offer social media marketing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive social media marketing services including strategy, content creation, community management, paid social advertising, and analytics for all major platforms.

faqs.question: Can Inchtomilez help with video production?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer professional video production services including corporate videos, product videos, social media content, event coverage, and post-production editing.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez provide content marketing services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer content marketing including blog writing, website copywriting, email content, social media content, infographics, and comprehensive content strategies.

faqs.question: What is the typical timeline for SEO results?
faqs.answer: SEO is a long-term strategy. Typically, you can expect to see initial improvements in 3-4 months, with substantial results in 6-12 months depending on competition and current website status.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez offer e-commerce development?
faqs.answer: Yes, we build complete e-commerce solutions on platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, and custom platforms with payment gateway integration, inventory management, and marketing features.

faqs.question: Can Inchtomilez manage my Google Business Profile?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer local SEO services including Google Business Profile optimization, local citations, review management, and local search strategy.

faqs.question: Does Inchtomilez provide analytics and reporting?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide detailed analytics and monthly reports showing key metrics, campaign performance, ROI, and actionable insights for continuous improvement.

faqs.question: What is Inchtomilez's approach to digital marketing?
faqs.answer: We use a data-driven, results-focused approach combining market research, competitive analysis, strategic planning, creative execution, and continuous optimization to deliver measurable ROI.
